articles.author: ET Bureau
articles.title: Analysts raise price target on Titan stock - Economic Times
articles.description: Citigroup's price target is the most optimistic among brokerage firms. It sees a 23% upside potential from the current levels. CLSA also raised its price target after seeing comprehensive growth across Titan's business segments.
articles.content: Mumbai: Analysts retained their bullish calls on Titan and raised price targets on the stock after India's largest branded jewellery maker reported a 25% jump in fourth quarter revenue (from operatio… [+1187 chars]
